phrases: Phil?
I am playing hide-and-seek with Naila and Eugene.
I see.
So...
What we need to investigate now is...
Outside.
We know most of what we need to about the House.
The training is going well.
The tracking devices can be broken.
We just need...
we can definitely clear the wall.
Next is checking out an escape route.
So this escape has three steps.
One, get over the wall and escape.
Two, get away from this farm safely.
Three, establish a way to survive outside and become self-reliant.
Currently, we have hope of accomplishing the first step.
Next is the second step.
We need to focus on the outside.
Evade the pursuers and get away from the farm safely.
We need to examine and prepare for that.
First, we need information about the area around the farm.
Oh, when I climbed up the tree, I saw a forest beyond the wall.
Those are the things we need to properly check.
We should look into it as soon as tomorrow.
Okay.
Hey, can I talk about another thing having to do with when we get outside?
I have someone I want to introduce.
Sorry, Mom.
I am in a rush!
Mom, look!
I did it.
Amazing, right?
The person I want to introduce is...
this person.
Mr. William Minerva?
Yep.
Who is he?
I do not know.
What I do know is that he is the previous owner of that book.
But he could be someone who is on our side.
What do you mean?
This person has been conveying a certain message through books.
And not just one book.
Through many of them!
This symbol is...
A bookplate.
A label that indicates the book's owner before it came here.
And what is that certain message?
Look carefully.
They all look like the same owl.
No.
This circle...
Morse code!
Correct.
Run.
Doubt.
Danger.
Truth.
But with just this...
What about these?
Harvest.
Monster.
Farm.
Farm.
This is a message from the outside to us, hidden from the demons and the adults.
I think we can at least trust that.
Trust that?
Unlike her, I am more suspicious.
This man named Minerva could be an ally to us.
But we do not know if he is dead or alive.
We should not get our hopes up too much.
Why are you always like that?
William Minerva.
This man is outside and knows our farm exists.
And though indirectly, he is trying to help us.
Yes!
There was an ally on the outside.
And he might still be there.
If that is true, then there could be a society of humans outside.
Exactly!
These kinds of messages can only be found in Minerva's books.
I do not know when these labels were attached,
but I at least know this one was attached after the year 2015.
I see.
Is there anything else we could know?
Like something in common between the contents or the type of books?
Not much.
The genres are varied.
The publishers and the years were
But what about that thing?
Uh, which one was it?
I did not understand the Morse code on these two books.
For the content, one is a typical adventure novel,
and a mythology book that I did not really understand.
There is no Morse code on this.
And the other one is...
Promise.
Promise?
Why is this here?
So it was true, what they said.
Mom was lying.
No one was sent to foster families.
But why...
Because if they were, there is no way this would be here.
It would have been delivered to Conny.
It is not just Little Bunny.
They were all snatched away from them by Mom when they left,
and they were all taken away by bad people.
Stop it.
I think these have a meaning.
Like how one book does not have the Morse code, and there were others with ripped pages.
And the message of promise.
So you think these two books are special?
Yeah.
I feel like...
these will become some kind of an important guide for us.
What is your reasoning?
My hunch!
Do not give me that look!
Who is Mom communicating with?
The base Ray was talking about?
Are they the bad people?
That is right, he said he had Mom under control, but we are doomed if Sister finds out.
What did he mean by doomed?
If they find out, is Mom or Sister going to do something to us?
What if Mom is much more dangerous, and Conny and our siblings are already...
Stop it.
Norman said he does not know what happened to Conny.
No.
They are just hiding it from us.
They probably have a reason and cannot tell us.
I cannot believe them like that.
Because they do not believe in us.
But I think it is worth looking into.
Mr. Minerva and the mystery of his books.
We are not just running away.
Let us find a way for us to survive in this world.
Yeah.
Let us run away.
Let us live.
No matter what the world is like.
Hold on, Phil.
I will be there in a moment.
But I am surprised.
It is expected from Ray who reads books all the time, but...
For Emma to notice those bookplates...
I was not the one who noticed them.
Phil found them and told me.
Phil?
Yeah.
He was reading a childrens book and it was one of Mr. Minerva's.
It was a book that had Morse code in the story.
Can you get the plates?
Thanks.
Where are Don and Gilda?
They are not here either.
They cannot be...
Mom!
Oh.
What Is wrong, Eugene?
I found this on the floor.
Thank you.
I am hungry.
Don. Gilda.
Thank goodness, I thought you would...
Where were you?
So?
We went in to Mom's secret room.
How?
Don stole the key.
From Mom?
And, did Mom...
I do not think she noticed.
We already returned the key, too.
So probably...
You did something really stupid.
What would you do if the room was equipped with either a camera, a bug, or an alarm?
If Mom or Sister found out, you two... no, all of us would be
Tell us what would happen.
Would we get killed?
We found Conny's Little Bunny in the secret room.
So much for your I do not know and let us go save them.
We cannot even go save them, right?
Because Conny...
Conny and everyone else is...
I am sorry.
I am really sorry!
So they are really...
I told you, Gilda.
They were lying after all.
What are you hiding?
Tell us the whole truth.
Demons?
A farm?
No.
Just to be eaten...
And you are a spy?
This whole time?
It was for our sake.
Then Ray, you knew what was going to happen to Conny that day?
Emma and Norman, you both tried to trick us and take us out into a world full of enemies?
You are kidding me!
Hey, Don!
Don.
Are we that much of a burden?
Are we that weak and useless to you that you feel the need to protect us?
That time, when you asked us to help you, I thought you were relying on us.
Was that a lie?
We are not as smart as you three.
We are not, but still...
Are not we siblings?
I just want you to have a little faith in us!
Sorry, I am acting a little weird right now.
I am going to go cool off.
Don.
I was wrong.
That is not it.
I am just taking it out on them.
I am not frustrated because they treated us like weaklings.
I made them lie.
I could not do anything for Conny and the others.
I am ignorant and powerless.
It is frustrating because I really am a weakling.
It is so frustrating!
I want to become stronger.
I want to become stronger.
Yeah.
Don!
Gilda!
Emma.
Sorry.
I did not understand.
I was prepared to be resented, but I did not have enough resolve to believe in you!
I am also...
Sorry.
No, well, I am also sorry that I suddenly punched you.
Are you okay?
You are not, huh?
I will be okay.
I am sorry, too, about acting on our own.
Yeah.
Of course Ray would get mad.
So we are really...
Come on, Ray.
Geez, fine.
Even if the worst happens, I will take care of it somehow.
I am also sorry for the other things I did.
I apologize.
Don. Gilda.
There is no more lying, so let me ask again.
If we mess up, we die.
The outside is, at worst, a world full of demons.
Even so, will you run away with us?
Of course we will!
I feel better now that we told them the truth.
Yeah.
One week until we carry out our plan.
The preparations are going well, too.
We just have to figure out how to escape with everyone.
Hey, Norman, about that...
I tried to figure out on my own how to escape with everyone.
Do you think it is reckless?
It is.
But with this plan, we can catch Mom off guard.
Realistically, this is the only way to escape with everyone.
Yeah.
Should we tell Ray?
No.
Do you think Ray would really have everyone escape?
Of course he would.
Ray's been moving all this time while thinking about us.
Always, for the both of us.
Both of us?
Oh.
Do not worry.
I will bring it up to Ray sometime soon.
Okay.
All this to make sure you two do not get killed.
I see.
You are amazing, Ray.
I stole them, just like you wanted.
Detergent and herbicide.
What are you going to use these for?
They will come in handy for our investigation.
By investigation, you mean we will go past the fence to climb the wall and look outside, right?
What about the tracking devices?
We just have to make sure they do not check them.
We will have both Mom and Sister looking somewhere else,
and create a situation where they will not look at their trackers.
But how?
I will have Ray stall Mom.
I am having him give her false information.
So you had a fight with that Norman?
We had a difference of opinion.
So what did you want to tell me?
Norman is trying to kill you.
If he wants to escape with everyone, that is something he would think of.
And?
He is collecting items.
A hammer, detergent, herbicide, or anything else that he thinks he can use.
Including that rope that is too short?
Yeah.
I tried to stop him, you know.
I told him it is too risky and wrong.
And that is how you got that bruise.
Murder by poison.
Chemicals can be troublesome.
Yeah.
You would better not ship them out early.
I want them to live to the end, until 12 years old.
In this House, without any discomforts.
So let us replace the chemicals with something else.
Put fake stuff in the containers.
Do you know where it is?
- Yeah. -
Then let us deal with this tomorrow.
Is that all you have to report?
Yeah.
Do you have something else that is bothering you?
Not at all.
Oh, right.
I am letting you know a little early.
I received a notification from the top at yesterday's scheduled check-in.
The next shipment has been set.
There will be no regular shipment for next month.
Then the next one will be in January.
My 12th birthday.
So the next shipment will finally be me, huh?
But even if we leave Ray to deal with Mom, what about Sister?
Yeah, if she finds out, we will be shipped out immediately, right?
Do not worry, I have an idea.
Do you need something?
I saw it.
I was watching the whole thing!
Talking in the dining hall last night, all of you!
The ones who know the secret about this House
is Norman, Emma, Ray, Gilda, and Don.
The five of you.
So...
would you like to join forces?
